title: Slow Motion Lag With Low Ping
body: Recently, I have been experiencing a weird sort of lag. The game will randomly slow down to around half speed and then suddenly speed up again. My ping is at a stable 29-30 and I have never experienced internet lag before. This is also not a graphics problem because not only are the league graphics still fine (just happening slower), I can still run other games with high frames too. I also get instances where I appear to teleport short distances after freezing for a second and the delayed use of abilities or movements. Any ideas on what could be happening and what I can do to fix it is appreciated.

replies.body: It's key to figure out if this is happening as a result of something like packet loss, or game files not rendering properly.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) on the impacted games to get an analysis of your specific case, and let me know what you find.
It said no issues. Could this possibly be a result of recently changing my processor?

It could definitely be!  Have you updated your drivers?  This could definitely be a hardware or settings issue in this case.  See if our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide might be able to help here for your specific issue.

i tried all the advice there but nothing really worked. there are some textures that dont load properly, such as ekko q. there is no animation of it traveling, it just appears at max range then disappears shortly after.

Ah that sucks to hear.  :(  No worries, though, we can dig a bit deeper to see what's going on.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to collect some logs, and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can look into this with you directly.
